verses.name: Philippians 3:17
verses.text: Brethren, be followers together of me, and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample.

verses.name: Philippians 3:18
verses.text: (For many walk, of whom I have told you often, and now tell you even weeping, that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ:

verses.name: Philippians 3:19
verses.text: Whose end is destruction, whose God is their belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who mind earthly things.)

verses.name: Philippians 3:20
verses.text: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:
